import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './ManageEstimate.css'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import axios from 'axios'; const ManageEstimate = () => { const [estimates, setEstimates] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8080/estimate/all') .then(response => { setEstimates(response.data); }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching estimates:', error); }); }, []); return (

{index + 1} {estimate.chain.group.group_name} {estimate.chain.chain_id} {estimate.brandName} {estimate.zoneName} {estimate.service} {estimate.quantity} {estimate.costPerUnit} {estimate.totalCost}

); }; export default ManageEstimate;
